name: Don't get caught !
description:
Hi, this our submission for the the "Mini Jame Gam 16" 

How to play:

WASD, Arrows:  moving 

Spacebar:  steal 

In this game you have to steal things in the store and don't get caught by the vigilator, you have to steal as many items as possible to get the most points possible, if the vigilator get you, you loose, to steal you have to face the sheves and push the spacebar until the bar is filled. 

Credits/Tools: Art (Aseprite, Photoshop) : 

Macbarette (itch.io)

Jupiton  (deviantart, itch.io)

Programming (GameMakerStudio 2) : 

quafran (github, itch.io)

gimleesan (github, itch.io)
